original_title: Dead by Dawn 2 - the Mask of Conrad
overview: Dead by Dawn 2 once again pits the maniacal Dr. Krauss (Andy Dallas) and his masked psychic Conrad against a group of college students trying to survive the night. Out in the woods filming a horror movie, three friends don't realize that the man behind the killer's mask is no actor...
title: Dead by Dawn 2 - the Mask of Conrad
